article:
It was Sunday. After dinner, Kate would like to see a movie with her _ . But her mother said,"Could you please _ the dishes ,Kate? I have to go to look after your brother."
Kate's brother John was ill in _ . Her father worked in another town and he was very _ and couldn't come back, Kate had to help her mother do some chores. But her mother usually did everything and Kate didn't know _ to do chores.
Kate decided to _ her friend first. On the telephone, she told her friend to wait for her at home. Then Kate's mother _ her how to do the dishes. Before leaving, Kate's mother said, "Be careful, Kate. Don't drop _ ."
"Don't _ , Mommy,"said Kate. "They're light. I don't think they'll hurt my feet."
